name: Train Simulator 2021: Norfolk Southern Dash8-40C Loco
summary: As part of GE Transportation Systems' Dash 8 Series, the popular Dash8-40C is one of the most popular locomotives in the series, and is now available for Train Simulator 2021. Built by General Electric between 1987 and 1992, more than 500 Dash8-40C locomotives entered service for a number of US railroad companies.
